TopicTitle: What do you think about my rocket (0.24.2)

Articles.Content:
"I decided to switch LV-T30 to weaker to LV-T45
I designet this roccket to make following secifiation:
TEST Rockomax BACC Solid Fueul Boster:
Spec:
ALT 1270 to 1680
Speed 190 m/s to 690
TEST Radial Decoupler
ALT 650 to 1250
speed 210 to 610 ms/2"

http://1drv.ms/1A7jqUO Edited August 11, 2014 by Pawelk198604

You really should edit your video down a bit. It's not a lot of content for 34+ minutes, honestly I skipped through most of it. The rocket seems nice enough, though you could make it much shorter by placing your fuel tanks below the tricoupler instead of above it.

That's meant as constructive criticism, not discouragement.

The rocket seems nice enough, though you could make it much shorter by placing your fuel tanks below the tricoupler instead of above it.

That's meant as constructive criticism, not discouragement.

Fuel tanks below thricupler, how?

And did you think this rocket can made, flight within contract specification?

Rather than a tall single stack of fuel tanks with the tricoupler holding engines below it, start with the tricoupler in that stage and place fuel tanks below, with the engines attached to the bottom of the tanks. This will shorten the rocket by a fair bit.

As for if it will meet the test criteria, try it and see?
